h2_title: The Webbed Hollow Luojia Fragrant Vines
content: This Luojia Fragrant Vine is in the secret area in Chapter 4. To reach this area, you must first defeat the Venom Daoist in the chamber to the right of the Pool of Shattered Jade Keeper's Shrine. From there, revisit him again in an empty room around the Temple of Yellow Flowers to unlock the secret area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Luojia_Fragrant_Vine_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Luojia Fragrant Vine Locations', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow Luojia Fragrant Vines' and the sub-subsection 'Purple Mountain Luojia Fragrant Vine'.
The content is as follows:
This Luojia Fragrant Vine is in the secret area in Chapter 4. To reach this area, you must first defeat the Venom Daoist in the chamber to the right of the Pool of Shattered Jade Keeper's Shrine. From there, revisit him again in an empty room around the Temple of Yellow Flowers to unlock the secret area.
